ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Contratos import CNContratoObjeto
handleContrato = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.ContratoHandle
widget.Hidden = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.Handle.IsInvalid() or CNContratoObjeto.ComissoesOcultartab(handleContrato)
podeVisualizar = CNContratoObjeto.ContratoEmElaboracao(handleContrato) if widget.View.Commands["Edit"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeVisualizar if widget.View.Commands["Delete"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeVisualizar if widget.View.Commands["New"] <> None: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = podeVisualizar
